dict.acceptation: 喷雾；喷雾器；浪花；（用作装饰的）小树枝；

sent.orig: Marcus junior invested in Spray Networks, a Swedish internet portal, but this was a disaster.
sent.trans: 小马库斯投资于瑞典互联网门户网站Spray网络公司，但是这是一个灾难。

sent.orig: Objective:To determine lipid peroxide (LPO) and malonyldialdehyde(MDA) in insulin buccal spray (IBS).
sent.trans: 目的：测定胰岛素口腔喷雾剂(insulin buccal spray,IBS)中过氧化脂质(lipid peroxide,LPO)和丙二醛(MDA)的含量。

sent.orig: Compare spray, shower, spatter, splatter, splash and slosh.
sent.trans: 试比较spray、 shower、 spatter、 splatter、 splash、 slosh的用法。

sent.orig: The new Pistol Grip Spray a higher spray also includes a foam spray option.
sent.trans: 新装溶液喷枪，增添泡沫喷雾功能，增加喷雾覆盖面积。

sent.orig: It can be as request, salt spray homogeneously, Salt spray deposition can be adjusted at random.
sent.trans: 挂壁式系统，可任意摆放，不占用有效的试验空间。盐雾分布均匀，沉降量可自由调整。
